text: “Goodou heia Taumaha o di Hagadogodo o nia Huwa laagau i godou madagoaa ma gaa hadi matagidagi godou huwa ‘wheat’. Goodou heia labelaa Tagamiami o nia Damaa hale Hagaabili, i di madagoaa magalillili i di godou madagoaa e hagabudu ai godou huwa laagau.34.22 Leviticus 23.15-21; 23.33-34; 23.39-43; Numbers 28.26-31
